Texts.Chs: 一本旧日记破烂不堪的一页。
Texts.Eng: A battered and torn page from an old journal.

Texts.Chs:
第14天

没-有-人相信我。 ...当然不会有人。 我什至不确定为什么我要再写下来了……但是我知道我所看到的，所听到的以及我的感受。 也许有一天某人会再次阅读此书，也许我的记事可能仍然对某人有用。 它发生在日哈克里（Rhakori）高地北部的一个小山谷中，一处古者的小废墟附近。
Texts.Eng:
Day 14

No-one believes me. Of course they don't. I'm not even sure why I'm writing this down any longer... But I know what I saw, what I heard and what I felt. Perhaps one day someone will read this again, and perhaps my account might still be of use to someone. It happened near one of those minor ruins of the Old Ones, in a small valley in the northern reaches of the Rhakori highlands.

Texts.Chs: 无论以何种方式，它在对我说话，我能理解它的意思。 它警告我一个特尔提勒入侵者正在迅速接近，这意味着我要拿一个隐藏在废墟外面的沙子下的小方块。 古者没有告诉我那魔方是什么玩意，但是无论如何都很明显，这件事本身更重要一些。 它告诉我要把魔方放在安全的地方，远离入侵者，然后，古者就消失了，就像它出现时一样快。
Texts.Eng: Either way, it spoke to me, and I understood what it said. It warned me that a Thelean invader was fast approaching, and that it meant to take a small cube that was lying hidden under the sand just outside the ruins. The Old One didn't tell me what the cube was, but it was clear the the thing was important, somehow. It told me to take the cube somewhere safe, out of reach of the invader, and then the Old One vanished just as quickly as it had appeared.

Texts.Chs: 那时我毫不犹豫。 立即跳起，以某种方式，我确切地知道必须在哪里挖掘才能找到立方体。 古者一定已经把它的位置投射到我的脑海中了。 我在几分钟之内找到了它，然后我跑回我的加德赫尔（Gad'hur），飞快赶回村庄。 我把那个立方体取给长者看，她拿走了，向我保证会把它存放于安全之处。 我想她很快就会将其运送到其中一个圣遗物保管库。 她问我在是哪里找到的，我便告诉她此时我在这里写下的内容。
Texts.Eng: I didn't hesitate, then. I immediately took off, and somehow, I knew exactly where I had to dig to find the cube. The Old One must have projected its location into my mind. I found it within minutes, and then I ran back to my Gad'hur, and hurried back to the village. I showed the cube to the Elder, and she took it, assuring me it would be stored somewhere safe. I guess she'll be shipping it off to one of the Vaults soon. She asked me where I found it, and I told her what I've written here.

Texts.Chs: 我碰到那废墟纯属偶然。 当它把我带入这些废墟时，我正在追杀这只沙行猎手，好大一头。 乍一看似乎没有什么特别的:那些巨大的金属立方体中，只有一些受到时间和风雨的冲刷，但仍然坚不可摧。 但是后来，我看到有东西在移动，中央的一扇门打开了。 最开始我犹豫了一小会，但是一旦克服了恐惧，我就上了。地面上有一个圆形的平台，周围有光环。 我以前从未见过这样的东西。
Texts.Eng: I happened upon the ruins by pure chance. I was hunting a Sandstalker, a big one, when it led me right into these ruins. Didn't seem like anything special at first: just a few of those massive metal cubes, battered by time and wheather, but still impregnable. But then, I saw something moving, and a door opened up in the central cube. I hesitated at first, but once I conquered my fear, I went in. There was some sort of circular platform on the ground, with a ring of light around it. I'd never seen anything like it before.

Texts.Chs: 我敢肯定，这就是古者所说的侵略者。 我试图说服其他人我的故事毕竟是真的，但是他们不相信我。 我甚至带领他们中的几个到废墟中，看到大立方体中敞开的门，但是当我们到达那里时，门是关闭的。 我的踪迹被大风抹去了，没有迹象表明我所说的是真的。 我几乎开始怀疑自己，然后……
Texts.Eng: I'm certain that it was the invader the Old One spoke of. I tried to convince the others that my story was true after all, but they wouldn't believe me. I even took a few of them to the ruins, to see the open door in the large cube, but when we got there, the door was closed. My tracks had been erased by the winds, and there was no sign that any of what I had said was true. I almost started doubting myself, then...

Texts.Chs: 她当然，不相信我。 她以为我一直处于幻觉中，那里温度肯定太高了，我只是偶然发现了魔方。 但是我知道我所看到的。 我不想和长辈争论，所以我离开了，然后回到了家。 不到一个小时，我听到号角在呼唤——一艘特尔提勒飞船被发现在附近，飞越了群山。 我跑到外面去，发现它正朝找到立方体的地方驶去。 一小时后，船飞回了原处。
Texts.Eng: She didn't believe me, of course. She thought I had been hallucinating, that the heat must have been too much, and that I simply stumbled onto the cube. But I know what I saw. I didn't want to argue with the Elder, so I left then, and I returned home. Not an hour later, I heard the horn calling - a Thelean ship was spotted nearby, flying over the mountains. I ran outside, and I saw it heading towards where I found the cube. An hour later, the ship flew back the way it came.

Texts.Chs: 之后，突然，立方体内有更多的光源亮起，我看到我面前的空气在颤抖，仿佛我正处于沙漠烈日之中，但立方体内仍然感觉凉爽。 然后它出现了。 一个古者-不知道是日海狄斯，还是另一个-突然出现。 它开始匆忙地和我说话，尽管我不知道它说的是什么，但我知道它的意思。 好像我的耳朵听见了外星语言，而我的大脑所听所见的亦不是言语，而是含义。 我不知道如何更好地描述它。
Texts.Eng: Then suddenly, more lights turned on inside the cube, and I see the air in front of me trembling, as if I was out in the middle of the hot desert sun, but it still felt cool inside the cube. And then it happened. One of the Old Ones - I don't know if it was Rhadeis, or another one - appeared out of nowhere. It started talking to me, hastily, and although I didn't know the words it said, I knew what it meant. It was as if my ears heard an alien language, while my mind heard not words, but meaning. I don't know how better to describe it.
